title: Face Unlock Set up keeps crashing during setup after clearing all security data. How do i fix this?
content: I got the can't verify face message so I removed my security options and tried to re-enroll face unlock but settings app crashes or it just keeps cycling between the initial 2 screens. I have a Pixel 4 XL with the May Security update. Thanks for anyone's help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
